{r}
## Simple Calculations in R
```{r}
# Assign values
a <- 5
b <- 2
```
```{r}
# Perform operations
r1 <- a + b
r2 <- a - b
r3 <- a * b
r4 <- a / b
```
```{r}
# Create vector
v1 <- c(r1, r2, r3, r4)
```
```{r}
# Add power operation (a^b)
v1 <- c(v1, a^b)
```
```{r}
# Create labels for operations
v2 <- c("sum", "difference", "product", "ratio", "power")

```
```{r}
# Combine into data frame
df <- data.frame(Results = v1, Operation = v2)
```
```{r}
# Show full data frame
df
```
```{r}
# Show one specific entry (row 2, column 1)
df[2,1]
```
